disclaimer.title: Translation Quality Notice
disclaimer.aiPhase: We are currently using AI-enhanced translation to meet the needs of our international audiences in Japan, Spain, and soon Russia.
disclaimer.currentStatus: Current: Manually vetting AI Spain-based Spanish content by hand.
disclaimer.upgradePhase1: Phase 1 (Profit): Professional native translation by certified translators for paid content will be used
disclaimer.upgradePhase2: Phase 2 (Growth): Cultural adaptation and localization refinement for paid content will be used
disclaimer.feedback: Did you encounter translation issues? Please report them in the Discord community!
disclaimer.thankYou: Thank you for your patience as we grow globally! üåè
